instruction: Please explain the main goal of MSCI ACWI Climate Indexes and how it affects company allocations within each sector.
output: The main aim of MSCI ACWI Climate Indexes is to reduce the carbon footprint of the broader MSCI ACWI Index through higher allocations to carbon-efficient companies within each sector. This could lead to better performance due to the outperformance of both intra-sector, carbon-efficient companies, as well as better-rated ESG companies. Overall, the goal is to promote sustainable investments and reduce the impact of climate change on global markets.
